content: Results from the C-CDA IAT in San Antonio are written up here. https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Z9JDmZZYncNKDM6Q7ja10-Yw8c3Mz-tCVHJunxBYhEw/edit#heading=h.eupkqds8qcxv . We'll be following-up on the open items in the CDA Examples Task Force to develop additional samples and guidance. Please attend the calls on Thursdays at noon ET. The call-in information is posted on the HL7 Conference Call resource on hl7.org. See you there!
Is there a way to distinguish Labs from Rads in C-CDA in the Results section? If so, can you post a sample here? Thanks.
